channel.title: Can some 1 Help me PLZ!
channel.description:
1. working pnpc code 2. how to change start items that u start with 3. code for wearing a mask and santa 4. how to edit prices
my server sorce already has it to where u wear a sythe and u turin into reaper but pnpc doesnt owrk :confused:
if u no any could u plz post here ty p.s you can come to my server at 68.74.122.4 port 43594 to talk to me...

item.title: Can some 1 Help me PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @inferno_vann inferno vann
item.description:
@inferno_vann wrote:

PNPC code…

[code]}

    if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 2) {
        try {
            int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }
    }

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Can some 1 Help me PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @Tai1 Tai`
item.description:
@Tai1 wrote:

1.[code]if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

		if (newNPC <= 3756 && newNPC >= 0) {
			npcId = newNPC;
			isNpc = true;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else {
			sendMsg("No such NPC.");
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sendMsg("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
	}
}   [/code]

Edit prices by finding them in your config folder ’ item’ thats what mines in.

Find the item id, and change the price.

Read full topic
